title: ICAI Announces DMBF February 2026 Examination Schedule
content:
# ICAI Announces DMBF February 2026 Examination Schedule

Ek important update hai! The Institute of Chartered Accountants of India (ICAI) ne Post Qualification Course â€“ Diploma on Management and Business Finance (DMBF) ke February 2026 examinations ka schedule announce kiya hai.

Eligible members ke liye Computer Based Examination (CBE) **February 9, 10, aur 11, 2026** ko conduct ki jaayegi. Application period **January 5, 2026, se January 9, 2026** tak hai. Applications online official portal ke through submit karni hongi.

## Read the Official Document
*   [Download the Official Notification/Circular here](https://www.icai.org/announcements/)

*Published on: 30 December 2025*
